explains: adj. 安慰的，使人平静的；舒缓的，镇痛的
v. 安慰，使平静；减轻，缓和（疼痛）；使（身体部位）舒缓（soothe 的现在分词）

sentences.en: The soothing voice announced the arrival of an e-mail on the computer.
sentences.cn: 舒缓的声音通知我电脑收到一封邮件。

sentences.en: Tom tried again, with soothing words in his mouth, and was repulsed again.
sentences.cn: 汤姆又试了一次，嘴里还含着安慰的话，可还是被拒绝了。

sentences.en: Cold tea is very soothing for burns.
sentences.cn: 冷茶对灼伤有镇痛作用。
